column2: The following is the address which I delivered:--
column3: The following is the address which I delivered:--

column2: This, this, coupled with our material prosperity, will bring into our beloved South a new heaven and a new earth.
column3: This, this, coupled with our material prosperity, will bring into our beloved South a new heaven and a new earth.

column2: He is too great for that.
column3: He is too great for that.

column2: The picture painted was a rather black one--or, since I am black, shall I say "white"?
column3: The picture painted was a rather black one-or, since I am black, shall I say "white"?

column2: If he is right, time will show it.
column3: If he is right, time will show it.
President's Office, september thirtieth eighteen ninety five.

column2: A line by telegraph will be welcomed.
column3: A line by telegraph will be welcomed.
